title: Can't switch back to the old client
body: On the login screen when i click launch legacy client the game closes then crashes does anyone know how to switch back?

replies.body: Are you seeing a specific message when the crash happens? Try running League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as admin*) to see if anything changes.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=dsEzsArg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T02:38:40.259+0000)
>
> Are you seeing a specific message when the crash happens? Try running League from the **lol.launcher.admin.exe** file as admin (r-click, *run as admin*) to see if anything changes.

I ran it as an admin and it worked thank you!
